title: GMOD.TF2.Content
description:
===========================================
Garry's Mod TF2 Content
===========================================

This torrent will allow you to spawn all
the props, characters, weapons etc. from TF2.

It was created to be used with my GMOD torrents.

===========================================

1. Extract the "tf" folder into your GMOD folder

2. Open LumaEmu.ini

3. Search for the row "MountContent"
   (If you don't find it, skip step 4)

4. Set it to 1 and save the file

5. Start the game

6. Click the little game-controller to the
   bottom right

7. Tick the box for "Team Fortress 2"

8. Launch a game and the content is now available

===========================================
